name: Summer Paws
description:
Summer days, warm rain, magical nights! Little kittens are hidden well. Can you find them?

Features:
  • 16 handcrafted summer islands
  • with over 100 hidden cats for you to find
  • so open boxes, search the forests, look inside tents and under umbrellas
  • and listen closely because cats meow when you are near
  • charming music
  • no timers, no scores, it's just you and lovely islands and kittens
